name: Filtotech Air Control System Private Limited
overview:
Filtotech Air Control System Private Limited is a well-known manufacturer, trader and supplier, established in 1997. The company is involved in offering a comprehensive range of Industrial Ventilation System, Cleanroom HVAC System, Cleanroom Furniture and Hospital Equipment. Manufactured using premium quality raw material and advanced technology, our products are highly demanded among clients for excellent operations, energy efficiency, sturdy construction, less power consumption, dimensional accuracy and others. We manufacture our range using high quality raw material, procured from the most trustworthy and reliable vendors of industry. Furthermore, our organization is committed towards providing range according to exact demands of clients, for which we provide them with the facility of customization solutions.

Product Portfolio: Industrial Ventilation System Cleanroom Furniture Hospital Equipment Air Handling Unit Cleanroom HVAC System Industrial Dust Collector Laboratory Equipment

Our Quality: We are following stern quality control process, ever since our inception in 2009. Quality is given top most priority by our professionals who leave no stone unturned so as to bring forth flawless Air Handling Unit, Double Skin Air Handling Unit, Single Skin Air Handling Unit, Laminar Flow Bench, Dust Collector, etc. All the products are based on extensive research work as well as cutting edge technologies.

Our Infrastructure: Our company possesses state-of-the-art infrastructure, strengthened by latest equipment as well as techniques. With the help of these machines, we are ably manufacturing bulk products within committed time period.

Warehouse and Packaging: We store our raw material as well as finished consignment in highly spacious warehousing department, which contains all essential as well as ultramodern facilities. Our warehouse is properly segregated into varied other sections, which helps us in well managed and safe storage of bulk products.
